remarks: Angle congruence is reflexive.  Theorem 11.6 of [Schwabhauser] p. 96. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Mar-2020.)
statement:
cgraid.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
cgraid.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
cgraid.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
cgraid.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
cgraid.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
cgraid.1 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= B ) $.
cgraid.2 $e |- ( ph -> B =/= C ) $.
cgraid $p |- ( ph -> <" A B C "> ( cgrA ` G ) <" A B C "> ) $.
